programme.desc: GG and MJ's gossiping with Anita causes tempers to flair and threaten Reza's 38th birthday party in Las Vegas.

programme.desc: Mohamed comes back from vacation and evaluated Sammy's work; Asa feels pressure with her image; MJ shows up late for GG's parents 40th anniversary.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: GG vents to her sister about Asa and MJ; Reza goes to Long Island to confront his father and discovers shocking family history.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Romantic tension runs between Mike and GG; Sammy and MJ set each other up on a double blind date; MJ confronts her mother.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Asa moves back to her Venice mansion; MJ and her mother get into a fight at a birthday dinner; Reza becomes friends with a Persian Princess.

programme.desc: MJ talks with a therapist about her issues with her mom and realizes there are more than she'd thought; Mike faces obstacles in his relationship; Asa an GG's resentments come to a head.

programme.sub-title: You Shouldn't Have Worn That Dress

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: GG finds out that Omid has been going out with her friends and without her; Reza decides to patch things up with MJ; MJ throws herself a birthday party and must choose to invite GG or everyone else.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: The group decides on a long weekend in Cabo; GG is left out of the vacation and instead decides to prove her worth as a businesswoman; Lilly and MJ are forced together; Asa's outburst causes tempers to rise.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: The group gathers on a yacht; GG struggles to pull a launch party together; Asa, Reza and Mike start having doubts about Lilly.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Asa is finally able to produce her first tank of "Diamond Water"; GG questions her friendship with MJ; Mike brings his girlfriend to meet his parents.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.sub-title: Hard for Me to Say I'm Sorry
programme.desc: MJ finally asks her mom to attend therapy with her after a breakdown at lunch; a friend tells Lilly that her business might not be "respectable" for a Persian wife; Reza rallies everyone together to make a decision about GG.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Mike is on a mission to convince his parents that Jessica is "the one"; Reza decides to get serious about his relationship with Adam; Lilly breaks up with Ali.

programme.desc: Asa and GG face each other for the first time since the dinner party in the finale; accusations are made; details of MJ's criminal past are uncovered.

programme.desc: Reza tries to fix things with MJ; Mike's girlfriend Jessica agrees to convert to Judaism; GG apologizes to Asa; Lilly throws herself a birthday party, but doesn't invite MJ.

programme.sub-title: These People Are Not Your Friends

programme.sub-title: Bad Things Happen When I Eat Salami

programme.desc: Mike uses an odd method to try to get more business; GG and her family go on a rafting trip and invite Reza, who tricks MJ into going with him; MJ still refuses to apologize to GG.

programme.desc: MJ and Vida work on their relationship; Asa reveals her plans; Reza's boyfriend brings home a surprise Persian neighbor.
